body: So you want to run your optimizer and nothing else, is that it? In that case, I suppose you would add your optimizer to custom_optimizers, and turn all the default optimizers off in the config.
body_html: So you want to run your optimizer and nothing else, is that it? In that case, I suppose you would add your optimizer to custom_optimizers, and turn all the default optimizers off in the config.
body_text: So you want to run your optimizer and nothing else, is that it? In that case, I suppose you would add your optimizer to custom_optimizers, and turn all the default optimizers off in the config.
